attributes.action: Charge stamp duty at a percentage above the limit, as it does with income tax, rather than a percentage of the whole once past the threshold
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This fairer system would mean that a house bought for £126K would only incur a charge of £100 rather than £1,260 and so on, which would keep house pricing and offers around the limits fairer

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions already with similar themes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
